data.title: A pleasant surprise
data.text:
I opted for the buffet since I thought it would be a quick lunch that would spare me the disappointment that the convention center serves.
I am so glad I went. The food was overall very good and with a tremendous selection.  They had a dozen meats/entrees. The lasagna was great, as was the sausage with kraut. The sage stuffing and macaroni salad were also wonderful. The mac and cheese disappointed - quite bland, not much cheese.  
I wish I had more time and a larger stomach. The ribs looked and smelled very good, but I had to say no.
The buffet, drink and tip for under 12 dollars is great!

data.title: my experience  of this restaurant
data.text: They offer a buffet  every sinday but really was not worth  tge money. Noy many selection and the atmosphere reminded  me more of a low scale cafeteria.  I only went one but thst was enough  for  me

data.title: Great Soup
data.text:
Had a quick lunch on 1/8/2013 with coworkers.  It is a basic lunch buffet with attentive service and as one person said the soup is medicinal in this cold weather.

Since it is coop they also sell groceries.  Well worth a visit.
